title: European Union Industrial Electricity Prices (2024-2025)
source: ENTSO-E Transparency Platform & EU Wholesale Market Data

regions.notes: Major Intel investment in Wrocław; price increases reflect transition from coal to renewables. EU Chips Act 30% subsidy available.
regions.content: Poland has industrial electricity prices of €0.171/kWh (2024-2025 12-month average from ENTSO-E day-ahead market). This represents an 86% increase from 2020 baseline of €0.092/kWh, reflecting Poland's energy transition from coal to renewables. Carbon intensity: 765 g CO2/kWh. Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. The country hosts major Intel semiconductor investment in Wrocław with 30% EU Chips Act subsidy support.

regions.notes: Major semiconductor hub (Intel Magdeburg facility). EU Chips Act 40% subsidy.
regions.content: Germany has industrial electricity prices of €0.178/kWh (2024-2025 12-month average). Price stable vs 2020 baseline. Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. Major semiconductor hub with Intel Magdeburg facility receiving 40% EU Chips Act subsidy.

regions.notes: Nuclear-heavy grid keeps prices competitive. STMicroelectronics Crolles 35% subsidy.
regions.content: France has industrial electricity prices of €0.123/kWh (2024-2025 12-month average). Up 26% vs 2020 (from €0.098/kWh). Nuclear-heavy grid maintains competitive pricing. Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. STMicroelectronics Crolles facility eligible for 35% EU Chips Act subsidy.

regions.notes: Highest prices in Western EU due to limited domestic energy production.
regions.content: Italy has industrial electricity prices of €0.232/kWh (2024-2025 12-month average). Up 38% vs 2020 (from €0.168/kWh). Highest prices in Western EU due to limited domestic production. Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. STMicroelectronics Catania eligible for 30% EU Chips Act subsidy.

Spain has industrial electricity prices of €0.127/kWh (2024-2025 12-month average). Down 4% vs 2020 (from €0.133/kWh) due to renewable energy expansion. Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.

regions.notes: Carbon tax includes EU ETS (€90) + Dutch carbon tax (€30) = €120/tonne.
regions.content: Netherlands has industrial electricity prices of €0.163/kWh (2024-2025 12-month average). Up 38% vs 2020 (from €0.118/kWh). Carbon tax: €120/tonne (EU ETS €90 + Dutch carbon tax €30). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 35% subsidy available.

regions.notes: Lowest EU prices due to abundant hydro and nuclear capacity (52% hydro, 30% nuclear, 17% wind).
regions.content: Sweden has industrial electricity prices of €0.078/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Lowest EU prices due to abundant hydro and nuclear capacity. Carbon intensity: 13 g CO2/kWh. Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 30% subsidy available.

Finland has industrial electricity prices of €0.084/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon intensity: 86 g CO2/kWh. Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.

Denmark has industrial electricity prices of €0.092/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon intensity: 109 g CO2/kWh. Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.
Belgium has industrial electricity prices of €0.145/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 30% subsidy available.
Austria has industrial electricity prices of €0.168/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 30% subsidy available.

Czech Republic has industrial electricity prices of €0.162/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.
Greece has industrial electricity prices of €0.171/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.
Hungary has industrial electricity prices of €0.189/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.
Ireland has industrial electricity prices of €0.158/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 30% subsidy available.
Portugal has industrial electricity prices of €0.126/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.
Romania has industrial electricity prices of €0.185/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.
Slovakia has industrial electricity prices of €0.159/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.
Slovenia has industrial electricity prices of €0.172/kWh (2024-2025 ENTSO-E data). Carbon tax: €90/tonne (EU ETS 2025). Data quality: high, verified 2025-10-14. EU Chips Act 25% subsidy available.

summary: Industrial electricity prices in the European Union for 2024-2025 based on ENTSO-E day-ahead market data and EU wholesale market prices. Key trends: Poland +86% since 2020 (€0.092→€0.171/kWh) due to energy transition; Italy highest at €0.232/kWh; Sweden lowest at €0.078/kWh. All prices verified October 14, 2025.
methodology: Prices calculated from ENTSO-E day-ahead market prices plus network fees, taxes, and levies. 12-month rolling average (October 2024 - September 2025). Real-time updates via ENTSO-E API.
references: European Energy Exchange (EEX) - EU ETS carbon prices
European Environment Agency (EEA) - Carbon intensity data 2024
EU Chips Act (Regulation 2023/1781) - Semiconductor subsidy framework
